_comment: This file shows the progression of profile usage - copy one section at a time to test

example_1_no_profile.name: No Profile - Temporary Session
example_1_no_profile.description: Simplest case - no saved session, fresh browser each time

example_2_exact_profile_name.name: Exact Profile Name - Direct Match
example_2_exact_profile_name.description: Uses a specific profile by exact name (you control the name)

steps.prompt: Navigate to my orders and tell me the status of my most recent order

example_3_tag_based_matching.name: Tag-Based Matching - Flexible
example_3_tag_based_matching.description: Finds ANY profile with the required capabilities - works for all users

steps.prompt: Search for 'wireless headphones' and tell me the price of the first result

example_4_hybrid_approach.name: Hybrid - Exact Name with Tag Fallback
example_4_hybrid_approach.description: Try exact name first, fall back to tag matching if not found

steps.prompt: Tell me what email address is associated with this Amazon account

example_5_tag_with_permissions.name: Tag-Based with Permission Requirements
example_5_tag_with_permissions.description: Requires specific permissions (buyer capability) - safety for automation

steps.prompt: Tell me what items are currently in my shopping cart

example_6_personal_vs_pool.name: Personal Work - Uses Personal Profile Only
example_6_personal_vs_pool.description: Won't match pool/shared profiles - personal work only

steps.prompt: What is my default shipping address?

example_7_pool_work.name: Pool Work - Uses Shared Pool Profiles
example_7_pool_work.description: Matches pool profiles only - for generic automation tasks

steps.prompt: Search for product with ASIN B08J5F3G18 and extract the title, price, and rating

example_8_graceful_fallback.name: Graceful Fallback - Try Profile, Allow Temp
example_8_graceful_fallback.description: Prefer authenticated session, but allow temporary if no profile available

steps.prompt: Search for 'AWS Step Functions' and tell me the first result

_instructions.how_to_use: Copy one of the examples above (without the example_X key) and paste into the Test tab
progression: 1. Start with example_1_no_profile - get familiar with basic execution
2. Create a profile via Profiles tab
3. Try example_2_exact_profile_name with your profile name
5. Try example_3_tag_based_matching to see automatic matching
7. Create multiple profiles with different tags to test isolation
